abstract: Yeom Ki-Hun (Hangul: 염기훈; born 30 March 1983) is a Korean football player. He currently plays for Suwon Samsung Bluewings. Yeom is a talented player who has made his way onto the national team following his continental performances. Yeom, who recovered from a serious automobile accident during the 2006 season, is a tricky left winger with a penchant for scoring crucial goals, including an important goal in the first leg of the AFC Champions League final.On 16 December 2008, Yeom Ki-Hun joined Premier League club West Bromwich Albion on a trial basis without receiving Ulsan's approval. He incurred blame for this incident.
